tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE telecommunication_healthcare_tracking (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    technology_type VARCHAR(100),
    availability_status BOOLEAN,
    usage_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE RuralHealthcareAvailability (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    technology_name VARCHAR(50),
    availability_status BOOLEAN,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE TechnologyUsage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    technology_name VARCHAR(50),
    usage_percentage DECIMAL,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE rural_healthcare_centers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    technology_used VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE telecommunication_providers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    services_provided VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE technology_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rural_healthcare_center_id INT,
    telecommunication_provider_id INT,
    usage_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE availability (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    technology_id INT,
    availability_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE telecommunication_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    facility_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES rural_healthcare_facilities(facility_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_coverage (
    coverage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    network_provider VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    coverage_area VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    device_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES telecommunication_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE usage_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    usage_date DATE NOT NULL,
    usage_hours INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES telecommunication_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE issue_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_description TEXT,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    device_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES telecommunication_devices(device_id)
);
